defaultHeadHtml: <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script><script>tailwind.config = { theme: { extend: { colors: { primary: '#1a1a1a', secondary: '#f5f5f5', accent: '#3b82f6' } } } }</script><link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"><style>body { font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; }</style>
